headline: Analysts Tout Three Chip Stocks Hovering Around Buy Zones
summary: Analysts pounded the table for three analog chip stocks after their fourth-quarter earnings reports, including STM stock.

headline: These 2 chip stocks are new Top Picks at Citi
summary: Investing.com -- Citi has moved Texas Instruments (NASDAQ:TXN) and Monolithic Power Systems (NASDAQ:MPWR) to its top Buy-rated analog semiconductor picks following the latest earnings season, saying the group has entered a more favorable phase of the cycle.

headline: Texas Instruments (TXN) Targets Wireless Growth with Silicon Laboratories Acquisition
summary: Texas Instruments Incorporated (NASDAQ:TXN) is included among the 13 Best NASDAQ Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. On February 4, Texas Instruments Incorporated (NASDAQ:TXN) announced that it has agreed to acquire Silicon Laboratories in a $7.5 billion deal. This marks its largest acquisition since it bought National Semiconductor in 2011. The goal is to expand its […]
